channel.title: Project on Tuan-Anh Bui
channel.description: Recent content in Project on Tuan-Anh Bui

item.title: SSFOD
item.description: Drone technology has had a long way to go, Drone now has the ability to be far farther, smaller, more flexible and combined with weapons link. Accompanying the development of Drone are the concerns about national safety and security when more and more Drone applications are used in the military or terrorist groups take advantage of terrorism link. Due to the above reasons, Drone detection technology is being set up as an urgent need and there have been some remarkable results. Radio-detecting drone technologies link have a range of up to 4-6 km, which is capable of operating in bad weather conditions or being blocked by buildings or hills HARRIER Drone Surveillance Radar. However, the downside of the system using the radio is that it is susceptible to radio waves and is ineffective in the case of drone using frequency hopping technologies. A technology that is being developed to replace radio technology is the technology that uses a high-resolution camera to detect drone by observing and detecting abnormal movements in the sky, from which detection, classification and localization of Drone. That is the goal of the SSFOD project.
